pageContext.claim: They're giving away your benefits -- that's what they want to do -- to anyone in the world who trespasses into our country. And, you know, we all have big hearts, and we want to take care of people. But when you say, 'We're going to give you free healthcare. We're going to give you college education... ' I sarcastically said once, 'We're going to give you a beautiful, brand-new Rolls Royce if you're an illegal immigrant.' And CNN went, and they said, 'The President lied to the seniors.' You know, they just don't get it. They get it. Actually, unfortunately, they get it more than you would think. They're a little bit on the evil side.‚Äù
pageContext.analysis: Trump at various times complained about receiving Pinocchios or being called a liar by CNN for saying undocumented immigrants would receive Rolls-Royces. Actually, the Pinocchios were for his claim that Democrats wanted to give immigrant driver's licenses. We -- and CNN -- noted that he later said he was joking about the luxury cars.
